scripts.clean: rm -rf dist tsconfig.build.tsbuildinfo .rollup.cache managed reports logs midnight-level-db coverage

scripts.it-testnet: MN_TEST_ENVIRONMENT=testnet-02 DEBUG='testcontainers:compose' NODE_OPTIONS=--experimental-vm-modules vitest --config vite.config.ts run
scripts.it-groups: docker compose -f compose.yml pull && DEBUG='testcontainers:containers' NODE_OPTIONS=--experimental-vm-modules vitest --config vite.groups.config.ts run
